166.customerMessage1:
I am wondering why I have received this code quite a few times for doing reviews and showing support and it never works for me. 

I think I have these codes going back months and never get to use any of the codes.
166.AgentMessage1: Barbell Apparel: Thank you for reaching out and I'm sorry about that! Have you encountered any error messages? Also, could you kindly share a screenshot of the items in your cart? I'll be happy to look into the issue!
166.customerMessage2:
It says already used? 
But I literally got the code this month and haven't done an order. 

Same has happened in the past multiple times. I am just getting frustrated getting sent codes that do not work.
166.customerMessage3: Thank you for looking into this.
166.AgentMessage2:
Barbell Apparel: Thank you so much for sending the screenshot, and I'm really sorry for the frustration this has caused. I completely understand how disappointing it is to receive a code and then not be able to use it.

From what I can see, there is already a promo code applied to your cart. Our system only allows one promotion to be used per order, so that is why the THANKYOU25 code is showing as already used and not applying an additional discount.

That said, I understand your concern since you mentioned this has happened multiple times, even when you have not placed an order. To make sure this is properly reviewed and resolved, the best next step is to email our team directly at team@barbellapparel.com. They can look into your account history and the promo codes in detail and make sure everything is working as it should.

Thank you for your patience, and we really appreciate your support. Please let me know if there is anything else I can help with in the meantime.
